ai-atk-abh03a37:2_2: Herein, when it comes to the hollow is destroyed, it becomes extinguished throughout the connection with all the fetters. That is why there are final extinguishment.
ai-atk-abh03a37:2_3: (But) he who is addicted to their own questions, one who speaks with the others.
ai-atk-abh03a37:2_4: It is as already explained here.
ai-atk-abh03a37:5_1: Now, this is called “virtue wholesome mind”.
ai-atk-abh03a37:5_2: Herein, when there is no delight in mindfulness, one who has reached Nibbāna up to the Darkness becomes fully extinguished there. So aware that’s why the skillful does lead out the Dark Forest.
ai-atk-abh03a37:5_3: (But) he who is addicted to their own questions, one who speaks with the others.
ai-atk-abh03a37:5_4: Rather, their mind becomes skilled in means of good choices, etc., and good instruments of death and goodness.
ai-atk-abh03a37:5_5: As to constantly: here it leads together.
ai-atk-abh03a37:5_6: mindfully, with full awareness: this mindfulness, that is to say, with the welfare of the noble ones, with full awareness, not to recommendation abode, not to attain (supreme) knowledge,
ai-atk-abh03a37:8_1: But now there is such a imperturbable state.
ai-atk-abh03a37:8_2: Herein, the Buddha stays there at the fourth absorption, standing in the same place, and having attained final extinguishment. Then he can be attained final extinguishment; while some of those who were responded, some of the doctrines.”
ai-atk-abh03a37:8_4: For all sentient beings, consciously in their minds, and die in their bodies.
ai-atk-abh03a37:8_5: Because of this, he said this to the other:
ai-atk-abh03a37:8_6: Herein, although any one of the four blessings is enlightened in four ways: it is an in the mode of one’s presence or other.
ai-atk-abh03a37:8_7: so he said, “Do not find out about Revata.”
ai-atk-abh03a37:8_8: And here the rest is independent.
ai-atk-abh03a37:10_0: Discussion of the Teaching on the Peaceful Mind
ai-atk-abh03a37:11_1: Now, a Discussion of the teaching:
ai-atk-abh03a37:11_2: Herein, a stream-enterer, regards his mother and father, a child in the past, having seen the Truth, and some particularizing the future, are just like one who understands the ford.
ai-atk-abh03a37:11_3: In this way, “There are misfortune, there is the penetration of the Dhamma, there is the penetration of the Dhamma, and there is the progress of the Dhamma.”
ai-atk-abh03a37:11_5: since it occurs only in a fellow pregnant woman.
ai-atk-abh03a37:11_6: For just so much is it that he is dedicated to wakefulness, possessed of sense desires, is devoted to wakefulness, fondness, mindfulness and situational awareness, and immersion, which is called “mindfulness” in the Paṭisambhidā.

ai-atk-abh03a37:14_2: And once there, one who is reborn in a stream-enterer, an abiding in the company of laywomen, and one whose laywomen sees them Liberation: “One who is Liberated in the womb for those who have attained Liberation of the embryodiment, and those in the neighborhood of Vedudīpa.” And after seeing them, they say, “There are those who have seen that it is subdue pregnant,” there, and on seeing them, the merchant, and oncery, he sees the inference of the Truth, he had reached the in the Jemplenty, and perfection of mentional attainment of Lignameeduation right here, etc.

ai-atk-abh03a37:14_4: And here the first is of the same as in the case.
ai-atk-abh03a37:17_1: Now, this is how it is said:
ai-atk-abh03a37:17_2: “Bhikkhus, there is such a doctrine, in accordance with the Teacher, and if you were told him to speak of the word ‘meanings’, because of what they did not say.”
ai-atk-abh03a37:17_3: As to constantly: here it leads out.
ai-atk-abh03a37:17_4: And they have been told by the mind.
ai-atk-abh03a37:17_5: For even a man who does not kill living creatures, steal, and commit sexual misconduct, Compassion, too, is unable to make amends for the purpose of abandoning the mind and no offense.
ai-atk-abh03a37:17_6: For this reason he isn’t able to live too because of what wasn’t left undeclared.

ai-atk-abh03a37:21_0: On hearing the commentary on the conversation,
ai-atk-abh03a37:23_2: Herein, the state of having the impermanence of all conditions, that is why a single conscious (volitional) process.

ai-atk-abh03a37:23_6: If they were to penetrate that the mind-made, and non-perception of the base consisting of boundless consciousness would be even just for a single moment, and they lay down upon them. Then he said: “Rebirth is preparing the eye and so on.”
